about_the_game:
A private detective who has been investigating paranormal cases since he was medically discharged from the police department. One night, he receives a desperate call from an old friend, concerned about the disappearance of his son, Oscar Garcia, in a small, gloomy town in northern Mexico called Santa Anna.

Arriving on the scene, you encounter grim surroundings, decrepit buildings and an atmosphere charged with mystery. Your mission is to find out what happened to Oscar and solve the dark secret behind his disappearance while discovering what really happened to your daughter.



He was dismissed from the police force due to constant displays of mental instability that affected his performance. During a particularly intense investigation into a serial murder case that he believes is connected to his daughter's murder, Santiago became obsessed with the case, leading him to neglect his mental health and personal life.



Santiago Juárez was a respected and dedicated detective with a distinguished career in the police force, however, his world fell apart when his 7-year-old daughter Valeria mysteriously disappeared and was later found dead under unexplained circumstances. The tragedy devastated his marriage and his wife blamed him for the disappearance and death of their daughter, which led to the deterioration of their relationship and eventual divorce, turning him into a man tormented by guilt and grief.

Despite his expulsion from the police force and the contempt of his ex-wife, he remains stubborn in his search for truth and justice, his experience has made him distrustful and lonely, but he has also developed a fierce determination to solve the mysteries that surround him, even if it means facing his own inner demons.



Description:
The detective has an innate ability to locate hidden objects and clues on the map. Using a combination of sensory skills and technological tools, they can uncover secrets that other players might overlook.

Features:
Sharp Vision:

Effect: Visually highlights hidden objects and clues in the nearby environment.
Use: Activates a temporary ability that allows seeing through thin walls and light obstacles.
Acute Sense:



Effect: Increases auditory and olfactory sensitivity to detect sounds and smells indicative of hidden objects.
Use: Listens for the sound of objects being manipulated or detects aromas indicating the presence of certain items.
Terrain Knowledge:

Effect: Indicates areas on the map where important objects are likely to be found.
Use: Marks zones on the map with a higher probability of containing clues or objects.
Intuition:

Effect: A sixth sense that guides the detective to specific areas where important objects might be found.
Use: Activates a temporary marker that directs the player to the location of a hidden object.
Clue Analysis:

Effect: Analyzes footprints, traces, and other signs of activity to deduce the location of objects or clues.
Use: Allows collecting and combining clues to reveal the exact location of an object on the map.
Detection Technology:

Effect: Uses advanced devices to scan areas and detect hidden objects.
Use: Activates an area scanner that reveals the position of hidden objects within a certain radius.
Environmental Interaction:

Effect: Interacts with the environment to reveal secret compartments and hidden objects.
Use: Allows moving objects, solving puzzles, and opening secret compartments to discover items.
Mapping Skill:

Effect: Updates the map in real-time with the location of found objects and explored areas.
Use: Automates the creation of a detailed map with notes on points of interest.

  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.6 GHz (4 CPU/AMD Phenom 9850 2.5 GHz)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 9800 GT 2 GB/AMD HD 4870 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Support
